metadata.title: CVE-2022-48738 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:ASoC: ops: Reject out of bounds values in snd_soc_put_volsw()We don't currently validate that the values being set are within the rangewe advertised to userspace as being valid, do so and reject any valuesthat are out of range.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-aws: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'ESM criteria, was needed').
linux-azure package in trusty is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '4.15.0-1137.150~14.04.1').
